briefTitle: Effect of Dietary Soy on Estrogens in Breast Fluid, Blood, and Urine Samples From Healthy Women
officialTitle: Effects of Soy on Estrogens in Breast Fluid and Urine
conditions: Breast Cancer, Healthy, no Evidence of Disease
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Effect of two daily servings of soy on estrogen levels in nipple aspirate fluid (NAF) and serum
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Healthy participant

  * No diagnosis of cancer

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Premenopausal
* Regular menstrual cycles

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* Not taking birth control pills or other hormones
